titles.title: A concurrent resolution to urge States and the Federal Election Commission to evaluate the success of the Kids Voting Program in Arizona.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/2/1988--Introduced. Urges State election officials and school administrators and the Federal Election Commission to evaluate the success of the Kids Voting program in Arizona in November 1988.
